Fritz Colonius

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3723630524102246
  • Última atualização do currículo em 12/03/2012

Studied mathematics at the Technical University of Braunschweig and the University of Bielefeld (1969-1975). PhD in Mathematics from the University of Bremen,Germany, (1979). Research grant by the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft at the University of Graz, Austria, and Brown University/Assistant visiting professor, Providence, Rhode Island, USA, (1983-1985). Heisenberg grant of the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft at the University of Bremen (1987-1989). Professor of Applied Analysis, at University of Augsburg, since 1989. Member of the Fachausschüssen Dynamik and Control Theory (chairman 2005-7 ) and Mathematische Analyse Nichtlinearer Probleme of the Society for Applied Mathematics and Mechanics (GAMM). Member of the Deutsche Mathematiker-Vereinigung (DMV), the GAMM, the Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM). Member of DFG Graduate Colleges "Analyse, Optimierung und Steuerung komplexer Systeme" and "Nichtlineare Probleme in Analysis, Geometrie und Physik", in the University of Augsburg and of DFG Priority Programs "Anwendungsbezogene Optimierung und Steuerung", "Ergodic Theory, Analysis and Efficient Simulation of Dynamical Systems ", and Control of Digitally Connected Dynamical Systems" (member of program committee). Main research interests in Mathematics: Control Theory, Dynamical Systems, Ergodic Theory, Stochastic Systems and several branches of Lie theory. For more details, in special academic advisory, participation in events, academic cooperations and partnerships please see the homepage http://scicomp.math.uni-augsburg.de/Mitarbeiter/prof_dr_fritz_colonius/inde (Texto informado pelo autor)

Formação acadêmica/titulação
1976 - 1979
Doutorado em Mathematik.
Universität Bremen, UNI BREMEM, Alemanha.
Título: Hereditäre Differenzierbare Systeme mit Funktionenraumendbedingungen und punktweisen Steuerbeschränkungen: Notwendige Optimalitätsbedingungen und Erreichbarkei, Ano de obtenção: 1979.
Orientador: Diederich Hinrichsen.




Atuação Profissional

Universität Augsburg.
Vínculo institucional

1989 - Atual
Vínculo: Professor Titular, Enquadramento Funcional: Professor de Análise Aplicada da Universität, Regime: Dedicação exclusiva.



Projetos de pesquisa
2008 - Atual
Linear programming approach to nonlinear deterministic and stochastic control problems: perturbations methods and numerical analysis
Situação: Em andamento; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Fritz Colonius - Coordenador / V. Gaitsgory - Integrante / V.V. Ejov - Integrante / J.A. Filar - Integrante / P.G. Howlett - Integrante / C.E. Pearce - Integrante / J.P. Aubin - Integrante / K.E. Avrachenkov - Integrante / V.S. Borkar - Integrante / P. Dupuis - Integrante / H. Frankowska - Integrante / H.J. Kushner - Integrante / M. Quincampoix - Integrante.
2007 - Atual
Control Sets and Spectrum Approach to Semigroups and dynamical systems. Pontraygin maximum Principle on Homogeneous Spaces
Situação: Em andamento; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Fritz Colonius - Coordenador / Victor Ayala - Integrante.
2007 - Atual
Informationsmasse und Invarianz für vernetzte Kontrollsysteme
Situação: Em andamento; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Fritz Colonius - Coordenador.
